edu.iu.dsc.tws.comms.mpi

Class TWSMPIChannel

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.iu.dsc.tws.comms.mpi.TWSMPIChannel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TWSChannel

    public class TWSMPIChannel
extends java.lang.Object
implements TWSChannel
    We are going to use a byte based messaging protocol.

    The transport threads doesn't handle the message serialization and it is left to the application level.
